com.radirius.mercury.math.geometry

Class Shape

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.radirius.mercury.math.geometry.Shape
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Line, Point, Polygon

    public class Shape
extends Object
    The abstraction of all shapes.
    Author:
    wessles

        Duplicate constructor.

      • Shape

        protected Shape(float... coordinates)
        Parameters:
        coordinates - The coordinates of all vertices in the shape. Will be parsed for every 2 values into a Vec2.

        Parameters:
        vertices - All vertices in the shape.

    • Method Detail

      • getVector2fs

        protected static Vector2f[] getVector2fs(float... coordinates)
        Sorts an even number of float values into 2 dimensional vectors.
        Parameters:
        coordinates - The x/y pattern of floats
        Returns:
        An array of 2 dimensional vectors based on coordinates

      • translate

        public Shape translate(float x,
              float y)
        Moves all vertices by x and y.
        Parameters:
        x - The amount every vertex should move on x.
        y - The amount every vertex should move on y. Returns The Shape.

      • translateTo

        public Shape translateTo(float x,
                float y)
        Moves all vertices to x and y.
        Parameters:
        x - Where every vertex should move relative to the nearest point of the shape on x.
        y - Where every vertex should move relative to the nearest point of the shape on y. Returns The Shape.

      • rotate

        public Shape rotate(float xOrigin,
           float yOrigin,
           float angle)
        Rotate the object relative to a origin.
        Parameters:
        xOrigin - The origin's x.
        yOrigin - The origin's y.
        angle - The angle by which the object will rotate relative to the origin. Returns The Shape.

      • rotate

        public Shape rotate(float angle)
        Rotate the object relative to the center of the object.
        Parameters:
        angle - The angle of rotation. Returns The Shape.

      • rotateTo

        public Shape rotateTo(float origx,
             float origy,
             float angle)
        Rotate the object to a point in rotation relative to a origin.
        Parameters:
        origx - The origin's x.
        origy - The origin's y.
        angle - The angle by which the object will rotate to relative to the origin. Returns The Shape.

      • rotateTo

        public Shape rotateTo(float angle)
        Rotate the object to a point in rotation relative to the center of the object.
        Parameters:
        angle - The angle of rotation that the object will rotate to. Returns The Shape.

        public Shape clearParent()
